item.description:
Lunch at a pub near Haymarket. Hennessy's opens at 11:00 AM so you cannot enter early.

I will wear jeans and a red shirt. If you plan to attend, please wear a red shirt and jeans also. This will make it easy to find group members.

I love to travel! I would love to learn about the pros and cons of traveling to each of your native countries. How is your native country similar to the United States and how is it different? What suggestions could you offer to a potential tourist?

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: english
